quote: The most important thing in a wiki is how tight the edit / collaboration loop is. Most wikis are pretty bad there. But Slite is an example of a wiki that allows simultaneous editing.
name: Jade Rubick

quote: Communication is key to scale a business. Slite is the best to keep easy to use for everyone. Templates to adopt the best practices. Summary to stay up to date on all topics.
name: Lee Liu

quote: Slite is easier to use on a daily basis. We chose to avoid a distracting tool to offer a place of focus and clarity. The tips on how to structure our knowledge were also a big plus.
name: Thibault Morlot

quote: Slite let us bring the two most important communication bits in the same place: documentation & decision-making. The connection makes decision-making more efficient, transparent & contextualized.
name: Sebastien Gendreau

quote: The reasons why certain decisions were made can be found in one place and not scattered across different Slack channels.
name: Jurgita Paulauskaite

quote: As we're growing fast, the ease of adoption is a crucial element when choosing a new solution. You can see Slite is more user friendly, and its similarities with Slack make it easier to adopt.
name: Martijn Hazelaar

quote: We switched from Confluence to Slite. Slite is easy to use for the entire company, not just the product team. Now, our entire company writes and organizes content in Slite.
name: Donald Sipe

quote: Perfect example of a product that delivers the 80/20 rule. No fluff and simple. You give me the top 20% of what I need that gets 80% done. Great for managing internal teams, simplifying internal docs, onboarding docs and easy to find what you need.
name: Eric Fettner
